name: Cloud Scrife
bio: Cloud was a soldier in the army,but after a tragic event he lost his memories of his past.

name: Tidus
bio: Ace Player of the Zanerkand Abes, just when life was great he was sent 1000 years into the future by a monster called sin.

name: Sephiroth
bio: The most notorious antagonist in Final Fantasy history, after discovering he was made for war sephiroth went on a rampage killing all in sight.

name: Terra Bradford
bio: The first female protagonist in Final Fantasy, she has enormous powers that was used for war.
